page.title: 10Farm houses
page.content: Most of the farm houses in this area are made of bricks.They were easily available from the brickworks in the area.The exceptions are the more substantial old houses like Manor Farm, built around 1820, and Raskelf Farm.Quite a lot of recent building has taken place again mainly in brick. This is either where the farmer has demolished the old buildings and had a bungalow built, as at Lund Farms, or where a new market garden has been set up,as at Three Gables.Signs of prosperity are the number of modern extensions to existing property: double garages,rooms designated 'computer rooms' and ponies in the fields for children.Farm houses predominate in the area with even the main street in Raskelf having four, together with groups of Farm cottages.
